verses.verse: <S%H8085>"Listen<s%> to <S%H3548>this,<s%> you priests! <S%H7181>Listen,<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and give <S%H238>ear,<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4428>king!<s%> For the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> is against <S%H6341>you;<s%> for you have been a snare at <S%H4709>Mizpah,<s%> and a <S%H7568>net<s%> <S%H6566>spread<s%> on <S%H8396>Tabor.<s%>

<S%H8628>"Blow<s%> the <S%H7782>cornet<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah,<s%> and the <S%H2689>trumpet<s%> in <S%H7414>Ramah!<s%> Sound a <S%H7321>battle<s%> cry at Beth <S%H1007>Aven,<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> <S%H1144>you,<s%> Benjamin!

<S%H669>Ephraim<s%> is <S%H6231>oppressed,<s%> he is <S%H7533>crushed<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment;<s%> Because he is <S%H2974>intent<s%> in his <S%H1980>pursuit<s%> <S%H310>of<s%> <S%H6673>idols.<s%>

For I will be to <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> like a <S%H7826>lion,<s%> and like a young <S%H3715>lion<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%> I myself will <S%H2963>tear<s%> in pieces and go <S%H3212>away.<s%> I will carry <S%H5375>off,<s%> and there will be no one to <S%H5337>deliver.<s%>
